Address.label: Address
Address.value: 700 LOUISIANA STREET,48TH FLOOR, HOUSTON, Texas, 77002, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Equus Total Return Inc is a United States-based closed-end management investment company providing financial solutions for privately-owned middle market and small capitalization companies. Its investment objective is to seek the highest total return, consisting of capital appreciation and current income. It focuses to provide long-term capital gains by investing in the debt and equity securities of small and middle-market capitalization companies that are generally not publicly traded at the time of its investment. Its investment operations include investment selection, due diligence, structuring investments, and providing management assistance and monitoring of investments.
